title: Error Bounds for Open Quantum Systems with Harmonic Bosonic Bath
abstract:
We investigate the dependence of physical observable of open quantum systems
with Bosonic bath on the bath correlation function. We provide an error
estimate of the difference of physical observable induced by the variation of
bath correlation function, based on diagrammatic and combinatorial arguments.
This gives a mathematically rigorous justification of the result in [Mascherpa
et al, Phys Rev Lett 2017].
